tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Nisha is well experienced gynaecologist. She explains the cause of the problem well and unlikely other doctors she do not recommend unnecessary medicines. 
However , the staff at Aveya clinic(where i visited Dr.Nisha) is not that cordial. They make excuses and cause unnecessary delays in giving test reports. But my experience with Dr. Nisha was a good one.

A very knowledgeable and experienced Doctor. She gives personal attention to each and every patient. She emphasises on holistic approach in her treatment and this makes her unique. I wd strongly recommend her to the couples seeking infertility treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor was so kind and helping she explained everything perfectly. I would definitely recommend everyone to visit her.
Thank you doc üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I totally recommend her** *** ** * **** **** ****** ** **** ** ***** .. before visting a gynea I was a little hesitant to how to share my problems but after meeting her all of my hesitation went away...she treated me as her own child and gave me solutions of all of my problems.‚ù§Ô∏è

DO READ

I visited the doctor for breast cyst treatment. First day she checked and told me the treatment. I was happy. But then on 2nd day she said that they will have to remove the cyst through surgery and took Rs 6000 for tests. 

On the day of surgery, the cyst came out naturally and surgery was not required. She scared me and my husband that surgery is required otherwise it will become serious issue. I said to clean it and put a bandage and we would think. 

Just for cleaning and putting a bandage she took Rs7500 and with the pen she manually wrote Surgery (I&D). *** ****** ** ** ***** * ***** I WILL NOT RECOMMEND HER.

Dr.Nisha is a wonderful doctor very friendly and supportive, experience with her is satisfactory and very good, but the reception should really needed to be more attentive and should know the value of time they should be not lazy , only because of the receptionist/ reception area is really need to be strong,

It was a good experience with doctor and all staff. I am really satisfied with the efforts made on very patient,from consultation to every thing done is taken seriously and with much patience. Thank you for such happiness.

They are so helping,they are creating a very cool atmosphere with the patients. Doctor Nisha is so polite ...always smiling... in fact Sahil ,Akansha are amazing... great work guys..!!!  keep it up!!!!

Me Ramashray and my wife Buchhi Devi are blessed with a a baby boy after 23 years. We are very happy with the treatment which become successful in the end.
Thanks Aveya
Thanks Dr Nisha
great. love the environment and the staff and the doctor. excellent service. top class. thanks for everything Aveya!!

My experience with Dr Nisha and Aveya team was excellent and I am very much satisfied with all my treatment. Thank you so much Dr. Nisha and Aveya team.
Dr Nisha is very  understanding, supportive doctor. The treatment is overall good. The staff and environment is also good and friendly. Dr Nisha is very helpful and polite.
every thing is OK but we still hope for best every time when we fail Dr Nisha gives us right information about ivf but we still wait for become parents
She is a very good doctor. She talks very politely. She made me understand the treatment in a very good way. The staff is very helpful and cooperative. The overall environment is good.
I love the way Dr. Nisha connects with her patients. she listens to the problem very calmly and suggests holistic approach to solve the problem. She is simply amazing
********* ******* found her counselling really helpful. her method of treatment is very good for any infertile patients achieve a positive mindset to be prepared to become a parent .

review: Doctor is so friendly.  She talked very sweetly about the problem and explained it very affectionately. I like her very much
We met Dr. Payal Bajaj as Dr. Nisha wasn't present at that present. She advised us well and answered most of our questions and doubts. She's a great one.
